TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxExclusive4 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxExclusive-4.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType with maxExclusive value -72891242177072146368.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -99999999999999999999 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-4 element, sets the values: -72891242177072146369, -9999999999999999999999 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -99999999999999999999 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-4 element, sets the values: -72891242177072146368, -728912421, -1, 0, 72891242177072146368 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-4 type, sets the values: -72891242177072146369, -9999999999999999999999 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-4 type, sets the values: -72891242177072146368, -728912421, -1, 0, 72891242177072146368 and expects validation to fail.
